name: Xtreme Garage: Drifter
description:
Xtreme Garage: Drifter is a 3D car racing game for drift and motorsport enthusiasts.

CAREER MODE
Play through a series of events to earn money and respect. Buy better cars and improve them to become the Top Drifter.
You can improve the performance of each car by upgrading its engine, tires, steering or brakes.

DUEL MODE
Challenge your friend for a realtime multiplayer race to see who is the better drifter. Both of your devices must be connected to the same wifi network.

PRACTICE MODE
Play Practice Mode to improve your driving skills. You can roam freely or try to set a new lap record.
Share your best results on the Game Center leaderboards.

VEHICLE PHYSICS
Powered by a realistic physics engine for an intense driving experience.

CONTROLS
The game offers several ways to control your car. You can choose tilt, touch or virtual stick control.

PAINT AND DECALS
Repaint your car or choose a beautiful decal to customize your car's appearance.

MUSIC
11 music tracks in different styles. You will find your favourite.
